investopedia.com/2015/04/what-are-some-e.title: What are some examples of positive correlation in economics?
investopedia.com/2015/04/what-are-some-e.snippet: The field of economics contains many cases of positive correlation. In microeconomics, demand and price are positively correlated. In macroeconomics, positive correlation exists between consumer spending and gross domestic product (GDP).
